Articles.Content:
Your challenge is to build a theme park on the flat grass next to the KSP. Everyone there works so hard, and now they need a little fun. 

There must be at least 4 rides that a kerbal can get on and off of. The ride cannot kill the kerbal, and the ride must be fully functional, being able to run and recharge if needed. Any mod is allowed, as well as Breaking Ground and Making History, but please state what mods you used in your submission. Make sure it looks pretty, because you need to convince everyone that you're best! Get the ride into position however you want, and make sure it is firmly set on the ground. Post pictures/videos so we can see your park in all its glory. Good luck!

Edited June 12, 2019 by DRAG0Nmon
We don't like grass.
Triop, very impressive. I like the way the airplane ride looks. What’s the one behind it with the big circle though?

11 hours ago, DRAG0Nmon said:

The Shaker:
Very cool, I like all the colors on the rides.
